"The Recycle Shop":
"The Recycle Shop

You can use the Recycle Shop to exchange certain items you may not want anymore (Outfits you do not want to sell, or high-grade weapons that you do not need) for various goods that will be more useful to you. (like Color Change Passes or Excubes)

See the Online Manual below for more information:
<&URL pso2_players_manual_preparations_arkslobby_shoparea>"
